forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
